Package ohos.sensor.data

Class CategoryEnvironmentData.GeomagneticField

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sensor.data.CategoryEnvironmentData.GeomagneticField
  • Enclosing class:
    CategoryEnvironmentData

    public static class CategoryEnvironmentData.GeomagneticField
extends Object
    Implements the calculation of the geomagnetic field at a specific location on Earth.

    This class uses World Magnetic Model (WMM) 2020, which is produced by the United States' National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency (NGA) and valid until 2025.

    Since:
    7
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Sensors#SENSOR

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GeomagneticField​(float latitude, float longitude, float altitude, long timeMillis)
      A constructor used to create a GeomagneticField object based on the specified location and time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      float obtainDeflectionAngle​()
      Obtains the magnetic declination, which is the angle on the horizontal plane between magnetic north and true north.
      float obtainGeomagneticDip​()
      Obtains the magnetic dip, which is the angle made with the horizontal by the Earth's magnetic field lines.
      float obtainLevelIntensity​()
      Obtains the horizontal intensity of the geomagnetic field.
      float obtainTotalIntensity​()
      Obtains the total intensity of the geomagnetic field.
      float obtainX​()
      Obtains the north component X of the geomagnetic field.
      float obtainY​()
      Obtains the east component Y of the geomagnetic field.
      float obtainZ​()
      Obtains the vertical component Z of the geomagnetic field.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeomagneticField

        public GeomagneticField​(float latitude,
                        float longitude,
                        float altitude,
                        long timeMillis)
        A constructor used to create a GeomagneticField object based on the specified location and time.
        Parameters:
        latitude - Indicates the latitude in the World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS84). The value is positive eastwards.
        longitude - Indicates the longitude in WGS84. The value is positive northward.
        altitude - Indicates the altitude in WGS84. The value is positive downward, in meters.
        timeMillis - Indicates the time at which the magnetic declination is to be obtained, in milliseconds since the Unix epoch.
        Since:
        7

    • Method Detail

      • obtainX

        public float obtainX​()
        Obtains the north component X of the geomagnetic field.
        Returns:
        Returns the north component X (positive northward) of the geomagnetic field in nanoteslas.
        Since:
        7
